reviews.text: now this is some recipe love it

probably waynes most underrated recipe. tastes more like a cake than anything ive tried before and after. doesnt really taste to much like caramel (a bit) but the caramel lends itself to the cake batter in such a realistic way, almost cooking it into a cake. its a medium bodied recipe and perfectly sweet. no off notes but steeping is necessary for the FW yellow cake or waxyness will happen. let it steep for about 14 days and you will be blown away. this has made it to my normal rotation. thank you PAST wayne!
This is pretty damn good. Smooth creamy intake with a light sweet caramel exhale. I really enjoy this one !
